description: Copy of BTS readiness dashboard as of Aug 3 2022- in case I screw something up tweaking things since there's no change control!
title: [zgc] BTS Readiness 2022 (cloned)

definition.content:
These are the key metrics for measuring success for meeting the load and scale for 2022 BTS.

Each graph has a marker to indicate the metric to be met and sustained through peak hours during peak days of BTS.

Read more about the BTS Readiness program, workstreams, milestones, and target metrics: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NVFQVkO6g6Bhz3jbvdtyKXh-ACZQXQ9NmRyHKeLZfJA/edit.

definition.title: Main App Request Error Rate Percent
